channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Room for Rent
channel.desc: Since winning the lottery in high school and blowing all of the money within three years, Mitch has moved back in with his family. When his father retires and starts to talk about downsizing, Mitch gets the idea of renting a room to someone, and that someone is a stranger named Carl. But Carl interferes with Mitch's routine and the initial head-butting between them eventually turns into a major war.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Son of a Critch
channel.desc: Mark fears he'll be outed as a Monarchist when he's chosen to give flowers to a visiting Lady Diana; a gift from Dick comes between Mike Sr. and Mary.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Jules Hudson helps a couple find a property that can serve as a luxury holiday business.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Remy & Boo
channel.desc: Remy, Mia and Nikhil want Boo to join in playing their imagination games, not realizing they are pulling Boo in too many different directions.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Gary's Magic Fort
channel.desc: Gary becomes frustrated when his cheer squad can't follow his instructions; with the help of his friends, Gary learns how to use his words.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Kiri and Lou
channel.desc: Lou warns everyone that meteorites are falling, while Small exercises.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Lu & the Bally Bunch
channel.desc: Barnaby doesn't like the pressure of choosing between Lu and Biba's games.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Daisy & the Gumboot Kids
channel.desc: Daisy is fascinated by beavers and the lodges they build; she leads the Gumboot Kids in the creation of a beautiful beaver habitat using a paper plate, paint and sticks.

channel.desc: The Gumboot Kids visit a farm, where they meet some cows; Jessie Farrell sings about cows and milkshakes; Scout and Daisy join the fun, too.

channel.title: Scout & the Gumboot Kids
channel.desc: The Gumboot Kids investigate animals that dig.

channel.desc: Bartleby brings home a piece of farmer Mosser's zazoony moss.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Mini-Jon and Mini-Maple
channel.desc: Mini-Maple treats Mini-Jon for the worst illness: grown-upitis!

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Unicorn Academy
channel.desc: Sophia and Val point fingers at each other when their things go missing from the stables, but when they see a saddle float by in mid-air, they realize something mysterious is afoot.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Unicorn Academy
channel.desc: Layla and Isabel spot the same mysterious phenomenon and head to the Stables to investigate; River and Glacier use magic to try and stop the floatingobjects.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Unicorn Academy
channel.desc: A legendary unicorn rider visits campus, stirring tensions between Sophia and Valentina; Layla gets jealous when Glacier reunites with an old friend.

channel.title: Gangnam Project
channel.desc: Unimpressed with the lyrics for Astra's debut song, Hannah decides to write something more meaningful.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Bernie encourages Aadi to have more fun, and Dee-Dee and James disagree over Laila.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Aadi throws a midsummer bash, with alarming consequences for more than one partygoer.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: A terrified Nina and Summer return to the cafe to the soundtrack of emergency sirens.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Summer and Nina retrace their steps, and birthday boy Steve hands Tracy divorce papers.

channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Kit asks Aadi to provide a statement; Tracy catches Steve and Cassie in the act.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Roy urges Nina to talk to the police; Ronnie begs Debbie for another chance.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: The Nature of Things
channel.desc: When humanity hits pause, nature reboots; scientists discover the surprising ways pandemic lock downs affected our planet.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Marketplace
channel.desc: Marketplace compares Canada's most stolen vehicles to the same models sold in the UK and reveals how the same vehicles sold overseas have anti-theft measures that aren't provided in Canadian cars.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Still Standing
channel.desc: In 2018, Oxford got famous for a 40-metre-wide sinkhole that shut down much of the town; but they have a sense of humor about it and have made shirts, cakes, even Twitter accounts for the sinkhole.

channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Maamuitaau
channel.desc: Jeannie Pelletier is elected as the new chair of the Cree Board of Health in run-off and talks about setting her agenda.

channel.title: CBC Arts: Exhibitionists
channel.desc: An artist spreads joy on Instagram; a man builds a collection of kitsch; a DIY bath bomb.

channel.desc: Anna and Edward learn new skills during a new poolside project; Ben and Vanessa start turning an old laundry into a cinema, gym and games room; Belinda and Lee take on their biggest project yet.
